name: Filecoin Code n' Corgi Prague: Meme-a-thon
location: PAN83 Bar & Restaurant, Hlavní město Praha
description:
Love memes? You need to be here. 💯

Meme-a-thon
Create memes or comic strips celebrating Filecoin builders, the developer ecosystem, or demystifying tech through humor. Whether it's a clever joke, an inside dev reference, or an educational comic - bring your creativity and make the ecosystem laugh and learn!

Make your submission here. A special prize awaits for you 🏆

Join us for a lighthearted and lively gathering of Filecoin builders, devs, and community friends - just steps away from the ETHGlobal Prague venue!

Expect laughs, plushie corgis (yes, limited edition Prague plushies 🧸), and plenty of Filecoin camaraderie. 💙

🥙 Food and drinks on us.

Come for the memes and corgis, stay for the code and the community.

Agenda:

11:30 AM – 11:45 AM
👋 Welcome & Corgi Check-In
Grab your swags, meet fellow Filecoin frens, and get comfy.

11:45 AM – 12:30 PM
🧠 Lightning Tech Talks
Short, snappy talks from Filecoin builders and community legends.

12:30 PM – 1:00 PM
😂 Meme-a-thon
Bring your meme game! We'll showcase the best Filecoin memes.

1:00 PM – 1:30 PM
🍽 Lunch, Laughs & Lounge
Delicious food, more corgi cuddles, and quality convos.
